title: Work a Claim Denial
description: A biller receives a denial for a claim due to 'missing prior authorization'. They need to investigate and appeal.

tasks.description: Open the denied claim from the denial work queue.
tasks.expected_outcome: Biller retrieves the claim and the associated denial reason code.

tasks.description: Review the patient's record to find the prior authorization number that was obtained before the service.
tasks.expected_outcome: Biller finds the correct authorization number that was mistakenly omitted from the claim.

tasks.description: Submit a corrected claim with the prior authorization number included.
tasks.expected_outcome: Biller resubmits the claim for payment, resolving the denial.
